client_description_Summary_Note:
Herrmann Krüger Schulze and the RM met at a financial seminar in Berlin. They attended several workshops together and exchanged ideas on market trends, which sparked a long-term professional relationship.
Herrmann Krüger Schulze is a 41 year old Startup Founder from Germany. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons he decided to join.
client_description_Family_Background: Herrmann Krüger Schulze has been happily married to Isabel since 2009. They do not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
Herrmann finished secondary school at Helmut-Schmidt-Gymnasium Hamburg in 2002.
Herrmann earned his degree from Düsseldorf University of Applied Sciences in 2007.
client_description_Occupation_History:
With a career spanning nearly 18 years, Herrmann Krüger Schulze has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Herrmann Krüger Schulze's first role was as a Software Developer at Bosch Software Innovations GmbH, where he worked diligently from 2007 to 2012 to establish a strong reputation.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Startup Founder at Software AG in 2013, further expanding his skill set.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
While working, he saved 130000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 3772000 EUR.


In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 1070000 EUR from his late mother, a renowned Venture Capitalist, in 2009.
client_description_Client_Summary: Based on the information provided, we are excited about the client's financial journey and look forward to supporting him in achieving his financial goals.
